headline: Block (XYZ): Truist Expects Strong Q4 2025 Results
summary: Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) is one of the Best Long-Term Tech Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On January 20, Truist analyst Matthew Coad lifted the firm’s price objective on the company’s stock to $72 from $68, while keeping a “Hold” rating, as reported by The Fly. This was seen as part of the broader research note, which previewed Q4 […]
